judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy and Baebieei, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
The former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
Order affirmed.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
The former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Donald E. Williams, Public Defender, for appellant.
James A. Caldwell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Joseph A. Bullano, Assistant District Attorney, and W. Thomas Andrews, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hilberry, Appellant.
Argued September 29, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Beien, Pomeeoy and Baebieei, JJ.
Donald E. Williams, Public Defender, for appellant.
James A. Caldwell, Assistant District Attorney, with him Joseph A. Bullano, Assistant District Attorney, and W. Thomas Andrews, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1972:
